original_title: 隠密くずれ 地獄の子守唄
overview: The second in Norio Nanjo’s “Secret” series. The former secret phantom Sanzo (Hiroki Matsukata) and Yume no Gosuke (Ashiya Gannosuke), who escaped after clashing with their superiors, travel to the castle town of Kurume in Kyushu.
title: Ninja Gangsters 2: The Lullaby of Hell
